Name: olly
Sentence: Mother says it's time to eat.

Name: olly
Sentence: Potatoes.

Name: olly
Sentence: Yes. Yes.

Name: olly
Sentence: I can fight.

Name: olly
Sentence: I was!

Name: olly
Sentence: It's too heavy.

Name: olly
Sentence: Night gathers and now my watch begins -

Name: olly
Sentence: I'm the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realm of men. I pledge my life -

Name: olly
Sentence: You don't mean it, do you? Telling the wildlings you want to make peace. You're just doing it to trick them.

Name: olly
Sentence: They burned my village. They put an arrow through my father's head right in front of me. They butchered my mother, everyone I ever knew.

Name: olly
Sentence: Will there be anything else you need, Lord Commander?

Name: olly
Sentence: Olly.

Name: olly
Sentence: I heard what happened.

Name: olly
Sentence: Figured you were hungry.

Name: olly
Sentence: Wanted to ask you something. If you've got the time.

Name: olly
Sentence: It's about the Lord Commander.

Name: olly
Sentence: He's going up to Hardhome to save all them wildlings. Wildlings killed my mom and dad. They killed everyone in my village.

Name: olly
Sentence: This wasn't a fight. We were farmers and they slaughtered us. So why's he saving them?

Name: olly
Sentence: The one he's travelling with, the one with the red beard, he led the raid on my village.

Name: olly
Sentence: How can he trust him?

Name: olly
Sentence: But what if we let the wildings through the gates and they cut our throats while we sleep?

Name: olly
Sentence: You believe that?

Name: olly
Sentence: Lord Commander. It's one of the wildlings you brought back. Says he knows your Uncle Benjen. Says he's still alive.

Name: olly
Sentence: Says he was first Ranger. Said he knows where to find him.

Name: olly
Sentence: For the Watch.
